root.name: Time Travelers
root.description: OverviewTime Travelers was marketed as "the game without a genre" and was developed and published by Level-5 for the Nintendo 3DS, PlayStation Vita, and PlayStation Portable in 2012. The game was directed by Jiro Ishii, who had been made famous for his work on 428, and features gameplay similar to FMV adventure games as well as Chunsoft's sound novels such as Machi.

similar_games.game: Detective Saburo Jinguji: Rondo of Vengeance
